wiki.content: Amy's turbulent life does not distract from the fact that she makes great music, which was reflected in her impressive haul of five awards at the 2008 Grammy Awards. 'Love Is a Losing Game' was the fifth single release from the critically acclaimed mega-selling album 'Back to Black'. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Amy's turbulent life does not distract from the fact that she makes great music, which was reflected in her impressive haul of five awards at the 2008 Grammy Awards. 'Love Is a Losing Game' was the fifth single release from the critically acclaimed mega-selling album 'Back to Black'.

name: Love Is a Losing Game
comments: Memories marr my mind.... TRUE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
2 years ago you were sadly taken from us. Miss your wonderful voice RIP angel
Can't help but sing along to this one. What a great song!
Plays now with the addict angels in heaven rip
Amy I hope your still singing, such a talented young woman.  May you rest in peace!
Will be back on tour next year!
Great song <3
great track by amy

Love IS a losing hand, Amy.  </3
Beautiful song from a troubled soul.. I miss her incredibly. ♥
(9 years ago)
Just pop perfection. Smart lyrics, minimal backing and the perfect length.
An absolutely brilliant song. It's so pleasing... Beatiful.
So raw and unforgiving, I hope her music lives on forever
